Title: Happy Mom, Happy Life
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Andrew Secunda, Lewaa Nasserdeen (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Dana and Adam are given a doll to parent for a school project, but end up in jeopardy of failing because of Beverly's "grand-smothering." Meanwhile, Erica tries to get back at Barry for ...
